creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-346: Some way to manage rad versions, indicate script compat
description:
* each version installation installs `rad` and e.g. `rad0.6.8` ?
* Rad knows how to find all these, can list them and manage them
* Have a way for scripts to indicate what they're compatible with or written with in mind?
* Maybe teach rad how to download & run target scripts with appropriate versions of rad.
